English.Text: No-one returns with a definitive clue. "Ivory gulls were circling above what looks like a large glacier," says one, "it may lead us to open water..." It's the best you've got, but soon your ship finds itself alongside the run-off of a sizeable glacier, which it being spring, is melting. There are cracks, then there is an almighty rumble as the entire wall of ice threatens to separate and topple into the water!
